sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均表示"致命的"之意。
means: deadly ： 指能致命或实际已致命的事物，也可指企图致死他人的人。
fatal ： 正式用词，强调死亡的不可避免性，多用于指伤或疾病等。
mortal ： 语气强，指导致死亡的直接原因。
lethal ： 指由于某物本身具有致命的性能。

sentence.Network_en: His mother's voice was one he knew; ice cold and deadly.
sentence.Network_cn: 母亲的声音是他很熟悉的：冰冷、无情。

sentence.Network_en: Broadcast news was accurate and reliable but deadly dull.
sentence.Network_cn: 新闻广播准确可靠但却非常枯燥。

sentence.Network_en: She took the gun and blazed away with calm and deadly accuracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 她拿起枪，冷静地连续射击，弹无虚发。

deadly是什么意思_中文翻译_解释_读音... ... The lecture was absolutely deadly. 这演讲实在是沉闷。 deadly poison 致命的毒药.
关于犯罪的英语单词100个_爱问知识人 ... date rape ： 约会强奸 deadly weapon ： 致命武器 death penalty ： 死刑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English dēadlīc 'mortal, in danger of death' (see dead, -ly)

entry.def: If something is deadly, it is likely or able to cause someone's death, or has already caused someone's death.

example.ex: He was acquitted on charges of assault with a deadly weapon.
example.tran: 他被判用致命武器袭击他人的罪名不成立。
目前正在威胁海豚生命的致命疾病

entry.tran: 为达目的不择手段的;阴险毒辣的;冷酷无情的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as deadly, you mean that they will do or say anything to get what they want, without caring about other people.

example.ex: His mother's voice was one he knew; ice cold and deadly...
example.tran: 母亲的声音是他很熟悉的：冰冷、无情。

example.ex: The Duchess levelled a deadly look at Nikko.
example.tran: 女公爵目光冷峻地盯着尼科。

entry.tran: 非常乏味的;极其无聊的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as deadly, you mean that you think they are very dull and boring.

example.tran: 她觉得这些聚会无聊极了。

entry.tran: (尤用于强调令人不快或不受欢迎的特质) 极其，非常
entry.def: You can use deadly to emphasize that something has a particular quality, especially an unpleasant or undesirable quality.

example.ex: Broadcast news was accurate and reliable but deadly dull...
example.tran: 新闻广播准确可靠但却非常枯燥。

example.ex: The north wind was bitter and deadly cold...

entry.def: A deadly situation has unpleasant or dangerous consequences.

example.ex: ...the deadly combination of low expectations and low achievement.
example.tran: 糟糕的是期望值低，收获也低

example.ex: It is here that most students fall into a subtle and deadly trap.
example.tran: 正是在这一点上大多数学生落入了一个不易察觉但却非常危险的陷阱。

entry.tran: (敌人或对手)殊死的，不共戴天的
entry.def: Deadly enemies or rivals fight or compete with each other in a very aggressive way.

example.ex: That would make the competition between rival suppliers even deadlier.
example.tran: 那将使得对立供应商之间的竞争更加你死我活。

entry.tran: (运动员或其动作）极富技巧性的，极难防御的
entry.def: In sport, deadly players and actions are extremely skilful and successful.

example.ex: ...the fastest and deadliest bowlers in world cricket today.
example.tran: 当今世界板球界速度最快、最具杀伤力的投手

means.word_mean: 1. causing or capable of causing death;
2. of an instrument of certain death;
3. extremely poisonous or injurious; producing venom;
4. involving loss of divine grace or spiritual death;
6. (of a disease) having a rapid course and violent effect

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who's too say the combination wasn't deadly.

auth_sentence.res_content: But another group of illnesses is even more deadly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But another group of illnesses is even more deadly.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dea死,消亡+ed表形容词→adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者
dead[adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者]+ly表形容词[放在名词后]或副词[形容词后]→adj.致命的,致死的 adv.非常地,如死一般地
dead[adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者]+ly表形容词[放在名词后]或副词[形容词后]→adj.致命的,致死的 adv.非常地,如死一般地
dea死,消亡+ed表形容词→adj.死亡的;无生命的 n.死者
dead死亡的+line线→死亡线→不能过的线→最后期限
dea死,消亡+th表名词→ n. 死亡;灭亡,毁灭

Sentence.sentence: The Sudan version was deadly enough, killing 50% of those it infected.
Ebola was so deadly and killed so quickly that within a short period of time, there was no one around to infect

sentences.en: She suffered from a deadly disease.
The shock was deadly to him.
sentences.cn: 这次打击对他是致命的。

sentences.en: He has become my deadly enemy.
sentences.cn: 他成了我不共戴天的敌人。

means.word_mean: 极端的, 非常的, 极度的; 十足的; 彻底的

jushi.english: This was the deadliest insult he could hear.
jushi.chinese: 这是他所能听到的最伤人的侮辱。
他们是不共戴天的仇敌。

jushi.english: The terrorists have chosen to play a deadly game with the civilian population.
jushi.chinese: 恐怖分子故意要同平民百姓做死亡游戏。
